video.title: Maya the Bee
video.synopsis: A young bee named Maya leaves her hive to discover the beauty and mysteries of nature, making new insect friends along the way.

episodes.synopsis: Hear the story of Maya's life, the hive, her move to the meadow and her friends; Maya sneaks outside the hive and decides to live in the meadow.
episodes.title: The Birth of Maya (Part 1) / The Take Off (Part 2)

episodes.synopsis: Maya and all her friends compete to become the Queen's junior messenger; Maya and Willy look for a rare night-blooming moonflower and get lost.
episodes.title: The Queen's Messenger / Night Blooms

episodes.synopsis: Sugar-loving Willy gets trapped inside a runaway soda bottle; a fly steals Ben's dung ball, so he must make a new one for the big dung beetle meeting.
episodes.title: Willy's Bottle / Keep Ball Rolling

episodes.synopsis: When Judge Beeswax discovers Maya lives in the meadow, he banishes her from the hive; Shelby's shell is cracked, so Maya and Willy help him fix it.
episodes.title: Judge Beeswax / Crack!

episodes.synopsis: Beatrice is grounded with wet wings and Maya must help her fly again; Max's friends come to his rescue when he's grabbed by a worm-hungry bird.
episodes.title: Powder Power / Maya to the Rescue

episodes.synopsis: Chris the cricket's romantic songs keep the meadow up all night; when the Queen leaves the hive to discover Maya's meadow universe, chaos reigns.
episodes.title: No Sleep for Maya / Royal Outing

episodes.synopsis: A huge slime trail and Shelby's missing mushrooms make Barry suspect a meadow monster; Willy's bear sighting causes hive panic, but is the bear real?
episodes.title: The Stranger / Beware of the Bear

episodes.synopsis: Maya's new caterpillar pal Momo transforms into a honey-stealing moth; with the hive fast asleep, Maya's friends help with a rare pollen harvest.
episodes.title: Misleading Appearances / Sleeping Beauty

episodes.synopsis: Philibert is a little fruit worm scared of his own metamorphosis; Maya takes bee dance lessons from Flip so she can lead worker bees to new flowers.
episodes.title: Philibert / Dancing with Bees

episodes.synopsis: The hive is too crowded, so Beeswax says Willy must move to a new hive; when Flip's cousins visit, Maya sees her friend change and begins to worry.
episodes.title: Willy Moves Out / The Wild Bunch

episodes.synopsis: Wild forest bees help Maya and Willy rid the hive of a parasite; after Beeswax sees Maya's flying accident, he insists all bees get a flying license.
episodes.title: Bee Clean / Flying Licence

episodes.synopsis: Maya helps forgetful Miss Beetle find her brother after a storm destroys her home; an earwig's artistic creations are misunderstood by the community.
episodes.title: Mrs. Hermit Beetle's Journey / No Friends for Dino

episodes.synopsis: Maya's little firebug friends are all alone, so Maya tries to find their mother; when Willy eats the Queen's cake, he and Maya try to bake another.
episodes.title: Mother Courage / Cake for the Queen

episodes.synopsis: Maya's friend Syrphie, a hoverfly, goes undercover among the wasps to recover stolen honey; Max likes a pretty caterpillar who suddenly disappears.
episodes.title: Hoverfly Spy / Max Has a Crush

episodes.synopsis: Lara seems to be able to predict the weather, but Maya suspects a fib; Maya organizes a shadow-puppet show to help Willy overcome his fear of shadows.
episodes.title: Weather on Demand / Shadow Play

episodes.synopsis: Maya tries to convince a famous singing bumblebee to perform at the Queen's party; Maya helps a colony of rash-inducing moths safely find their nest.
episodes.title: Hive Jive / Ring-A Ring-A Caterpillar

episodes.synopsis: Willy and Maya help a wasp who's in love with Beatrice; strange noises keep Max up at night, so Maya and Willy investigate.
episodes.title: What a Nice Wasp / Sleepless Max

episodes.synopsis: Willy's now king of an aphid herd, but needs Maya's help to protect them; Thekla's sick, but nobody will get close enough to help her -- except Maya.
episodes.title: King Willy / Thekla Is in a State

episodes.synopsis: A gift of pollen is on its way to the meadow, but is stolen by wasps; Shelby dreams of flying, so Maya tries to help, but it's harder than it looks!
episodes.title: The Great Pollen Robbery / Shelby’s Dream

episodes.synopsis: Maya has to decorate the Queen's scepter, but it disappears inside Kurt's dung ball; Maya helps a young bee who is afraid of flying outside the hive.
episodes.title: The Queen Scepter / Edgar the Fearless

episodes.synopsis: Ben meets another dung beetle and the two have a dung hunt contest; the ants think Willy ate their strawberries, but someone else is really to blame.
episodes.title: In Search of the Lost Dung / Forbidden Fruit

episodes.synopsis: An eclipse has the hive in a frenzy and Maya must help the meadow stay calm; Willy and Maya train a stag beetle for his fight against Pat the cricket.
episodes.title: Queen of the Solar Eclipse / Night of the Giants

episodes.synopsis: Willy and Maya's favorite flower is the last in the meadow, so Maya pollinates it; Maya befriends a mole-cricket who can't recall where her food is.
episodes.title: Maya's Garden / Molly the Miner

episodes.synopsis: Maya finds a nut-cracking bird to peck Barry's glasses free from a ball of bee glue; the wasps find Maya's buried honey reserves, plus a big surprise.
episodes.title: Barry’s Glasses / Alarm

episodes.synopsis: Maya and Willy learn that replacing strings on Flip's violin won't be easy; Maya helps the ants find seeds, but thief ants are on the prowl.
episodes.title: Harmony in the Meadow / Maya Commander in Chief

episodes.synopsis: Willy sulks because Maya mistakenly thinks he secretly ate their pollen supply; Maya and Willy help a forgetful little dragonfly deliver a package.
episodes.title: Sulky Willy / Dragonfly Express

episodes.synopsis: Maya learns about birthdays and organizes a party for herself and Willy; Willy's friends must convince him he's not an ant when he loses his memory.
episodes.title: Bee Day / Willy Loses His Memory

episodes.synopsis: It's pollen ball competition time for Willy, who gets help from a black firefly; Maya and her friends find an egg, but what animal does it belong to?
episodes.title: Rainbow Pollen / Follow That Egg

episodes.synopsis: Maya helps Shelby disguise his shell, hoping to ward off predators -- with unexpected results; Miss Cassandra develops a mysterious hive allergy.
episodes.title: The New Shelby / Bless You Miss Cassandra

episodes.synopsis: Maya's talent show is irresistible to everyone, including annoying wasps; with the help of firefly friends, Maya guides a lost Queen back to the hive.
episodes.title: On with the Show / Night Flight

episodes.synopsis: An ant-lion attacks the ant camp and Maya helps hide the eggs; when the Queen goes on holiday, her substitute's attitude sends the hive into a frenzy.
episodes.title: Queen for a Day / Henry's Cabin

episodes.synopsis: Maya and Willy meet former racing champ Grandad Dragonfly who longs for his younger, faster days; Maya discovers a little moth "haunting" the hive.
episodes.title: Wings of a Champion / The Haunted Hive

episodes.synopsis: Flip is feeling weak and needs help from the wasps to get peach juice; new bee Hannah creates hive chaos when she pretends not to be a real bee.
episodes.title: Thank You Wasps / The Outsider

episodes.synopsis: Maya competes in a pollen-gathering contest to win the perfect sleeping flower; after almost being eaten, Maya and Willy make friends with two frogs.
episodes.title: A Flower to Share / Greedy Frogs

episodes.synopsis: The meadow is so hot that Slink the slug is out of slime and Maya must help him rehydrate; when Maya gets sick, her friends try to heal her.
episodes.title: Once upon a Slime / The Big Eat

episodes.synopsis: Maya and Willy track down a "scary" earwig, but he's really just misunderstood; Willy learns how to guard the hive and the wasps pay a visit.
episodes.title: The Big Bad Earwig / Willy Guards the Hive

episodes.synopsis: Maya and Willy must plant a truffle under a sick oak tree, but Polly the mole-cricket keeps eating it; Maya helps little bee Zig solve a big problem.
episodes.title: A Friend for the Oak / The Runaway Bee

episodes.synopsis: Doc Slick steals Flip's violin to impress Lady Cricket and accompany her in song; Willy accidentally eats nectar that forces him to tell the truth.
episodes.title: Doc Slick / Did I Say That?

episodes.synopsis: When a cowpat lands near the hive, it threatens to stink up the Queen's reception; Maya's friends plan a huge surprise to thank her for all she does.
episodes.title: The Gift from Above / A Surprise for Maya
